short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension adds a summary of how many exercises on hive one needs to complete

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Hive++ is the chrome extension for all your hive needs. 

Version Notes:
    - 1.0.1    Hive++ will display a nice table of all the different modules and how much is: to do, redo, submitted and done. 
    - 1.0.2   This update removes the messages from  the front page and adds "Assignments To Redo" and "Assignment Todo" sections to the front page
    - 1.0.3    This update adds some UI improvements (offset background colors in the table and a better icon in the chrome bar). It also adds functionality to the icon/button on the chrome bar. When clicking the button it will either load the page in a new tab or the current tab based on the option you set
    - 2.0.0 This update deals with update to Hive. In addition it doesn't hang while loading the page. Some new features:
       - Options to remove toilet button and change the width of the main section
       - The subject are linked in the table
       - Module name has been added to the todo/redo lists on the main page
       - Rows are grayed out if there are no assignment to be completed


If you have any suggestions for future versions, you know who to ask...
